text: tatha yadi aap unhen us samay dekhen, jab ve (paralay ke din) apane paalanahaar ke samaksh khade kiye jaayenge, us samay allaah unase kahegaah kya ye (jeevan) saty nahin? ve kahengeh kyon nahin? hamaare paalanahaar kee shapath! isapar allaah kahegaah to ab apane kufr karane kee yaatana chakho
